We're happy to help.                   NYU Admissions staff welcome your questions. Before reaching out to us directly, we encourage you to do as much website research as possible.     For questions about the admissions process, please email admissions@nyu.edu .   Please include your full name, the school or institution you currently attend, and your city in e-mail correspondence.     During busy periods, it may take some time for us to respond to your inquiry.              Meet the admissions team                                                 New York                            665 Broadway, 11th Floor  New York, NY 10012-2339   Phone: +1 212 998 4500   admissions@nyu.edu   Meet your admissions counselor .                           Abu Dhabi                            Abu Dhabi: +971 2 628 5511  New York: +1 212 992 7230   Contact NYU Abu Dhabi Admissions .                           Shanghai                            New York: +1 212 998 4500   Shanghai: +86 21 6223 5037   Contact NYU Shanghai Admissions . The contact information provided below is for some of the University's more critical offices.         If you are looking for a specific person or specific information at New York University, you can search for them in our online directories, or call the number listed to the right.     Student Information   University Development and Alumni Relations   University Relations and Public Affairs                      Student Information   The offices below cover a wide range of needs for prospective, incoming, and current students. If you're looking for information regarding taking a tour of NYU, financial aid, registration for classes, and paying your bill, the offices below can guide you.        Undergraduate Admissions   For information sessions and campus tours:   Jeffrey S. Gould Welcome Center  50 West Fourth Street  New York, NY 10003  212.998.4550  Weekdays: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM  Saturday: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM   For questions about admissions and to mail application materials:   665 Broadway, 11th Floor  New York, NY 10012  212.998.4500   admissions.ops@nyu.edu          Office of Financial Aid   25 West Fourth Street, 1st Floor  New York, NY 10012  212.998.4444  212.995.4661 (Fax)   financial.aid@nyu.edu   Office of the Registrar   25 West Fourth Street, 1st Floor  New York, NY 10012  212.998.4800 (University Registrar General Number)     Office of the Bursar   25 West Fourth Street, 1st Floor  New York, NY 10012  212.998.2800          The Student Resource Center   60 Washington Square South, Suite 210  New York, NY 10012  212.998.4411  Contact via email: Ask Us a Question        Student Health Center   726 Broadway, 3rd and 4th Floors  New York, NY 10003  212.443.1000   health.center@nyu.edu            University Development and Alumni Relations   NYU’s office of University Development and Alumni Relations (UDAR) focuses on the engagement of the entire NYU community – trustees, deans, students, faculty members, administration and staff, alumni, parents, and friends. If you have questions regarding alumni benefits or giving to the University, please contact UDAR and they can guide you.   UDAR Office   25 West Fourth Street, 4th Floor  New York, NY 10012  212.998.6900            University Relations and Public Affairs   University Relations and Public Affairs is responsible for ensuring that NYU’s message, agenda, and image are effectively and creatively projected to both external and internal audiences. If you have questions regarding NYU and its local community, photo or film shoots, or using the University's brand or identity, contact the offices below and someone will guide you in the right direction.   Office of Public Affairs   25 West Fourth Street, 5th Floor  New York, NY 10012  212.998.6840   Office of Government and Community Affairs   25 West Fourth Street, 5th Floor  New York, NY 10012  212.998.2400                                          New York University        70 Washington Square South          New York, NY 10012                      212.998.1212              Department of Public Safety   14 Washington Place, 1st Floor  New York, NY 10003  212.998.2222        NYU Parent's Helpline   212.998.4219  Contact via email: Ask Us a Question        Office of Residential Life and Housing Services   726 Broadway, 7th Floor  New York, NY 10003  212.998.4600   housing@nyu.edu        Bobst Library Information   70 Washington Square South  New York, NY 10012  212.998.2500   Coles Sports Center   181 Mercer Street  New York, NY 10012  212.998.2020   Palladium Athletic Facility   140 East 14th Street  New York, NY 10003  212.992.8500   Skirball Center for the Performing Arts,  Shagan Box Office   566 La Guardia Place  New York, NY 10012  212.992.8484   Main Bookstore   726 Broadway  New York, NY 10003  212.998.4667   NYU Computer Store   726 Broadway (inside Main Bookstore)  New York, NY 10003  212.998.4672   Copy Central   547 La Guardia Place  New York, NY 10012  212.998.1050   Mail Services   547 La Guardia Place  New York, NY 10012  212.998.1010   Student Affairs   60 Washington Square South, Suite 601  New York, NY 10012  212.998.4410   Student Activities   60 Washington Square South, Suite 704C  New York, NY 10012  212.998.4700                                              NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University.
